chapter.text: soganda che la'inabandha ubha rahenara (pharista'o)na
pachi sampurna rite dhamaki apanara'ona
pachi allahana smaranamam vyasta rahenara'ona
ni:Sanka tamara sauno pujya eka ja che
akaso ane dharati ane te banne vacceni dareka vastu'o ane pasvimano palanahara te ja che
ame duniyana akasane tara'othi sanagaryum
ane vidrohi setanothi suraksa kari
mala'ul a-ala" (pharista'onum eka jutha)na pharista'one sambhalava mate te'o (setano) kana pana nathi lagavi sakata, parantu dareka bajuthi te'one maravamam ave che
bhagadava mate. Ane temana mate hammesa rahevavali yatana che
parantu je ko'i ekada vata sambhali le to (tarata ja) teni pachala salagelo angaro lagi jaya che
te inkara karanara'one savala karo ke tamarum sarjana karavum vadhare agharum che athava jemanum ame (temana uparanta) sarjana karyum? Ame (manavi'o)num sarjana cikani mati vade karyum
parantu tame asvarya pamo cho ane a loko maskari kari rahya che
Ane jyare temane sikhamana apavamam ave che, to a loko nathi manata
ane jyare ko'i camatkarane ju'e che to maskari kare che
ane kahe che ke a to khullu jadu che
sum jyare apane mrtyu pamisum ane mati tatha hadakam tha'i ja'isum, to sum pharivara apanane uthavavamam avase
sum apana pahelana purvajone pana
tame javaba api do ke ha-ha ane tame apamanita (pana) thaso
te to phakta eka sakhata jhatako che, acanaka te'o jova lagase
ane kahese ke haya amarum durbhagya! A ja badalano divasa che
a ja nirnayano divasa che jene tame juthalavata hata
atyacari'one ane temana sathi'one ane jemani te'o allahane chodine bandagi karata hata
(te saune) bhega kari temane jahannamano marga batavi do
ane temane thobhavo, temane savala puchavamam avase
tamane sum tha'i gayum che ke tame ekabijani madada nathi karata
parantu te (sau) ajana divase ajnakari bani gaya
te ekabija tarapha jo'i savala-javaba karava lagase
kahese ke tame to amari pase amari jamani bajuthi avata hata
te'o javaba apase ke na, parantu tame ja imanavala na hata
ane amari balajabari tamara para hati (ja) nahim, parantu tame (pote) vidrohi hata
have ame (badha) para amara palanaharani e vata sabita tha'i ga'i ke ame (yatana)no svada cakhisum
basa! Ame tamane pathabhrasta karya, ame pote ja pathabhrasta hata
ajana divase to (badha ja) yatanamam bhagidara che
ame aparadhi'o sathe avum ja kari'e chi'e
a te'o che ke, jyare temane kahevamam ave ke allaha sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, to a loko vidroha karata hata
ane kaheta hata ke sum ame amara pujyone eka pagala kavini vata mani la'ine chodi da'i'e
(Na na) parantu (payagambara) to satya lavya ane dareka payagambarone saca mane che
ni:Sanka tame du:Khadayi yatanano svada cakhaso
tamane teno ja badalo apavamam avase, je tame karata hata
parantu allaha ta'alana nikhalasa banda'o (suraksita hase)
temana mate ja nakki karela roji che
(dareka prakarana) phalo ane te ijajatavala, pratisthita hase
ne'amato vali jannatomam
asano para ekabijani same hase
sarabana jharanamo manthi pyala bhari-bharine temani vacce pheravavamam avase
je paradarsaka hase ane pivamam svadista hase
na tenathi mathano dukhavo thase ane na to te'o vikrta thase
ane temani pase nici najarovali, sundara ankhovali (huro) hase
evi, jeva ke, chupayela inda
(jannati loko) ekabija same jo'i savala karase
temana manthi eka kahese ke maro eka mitra hato
je kaheto hato ke sum tum (kayamatana divasa para) yakina karavavala'o manthi che
sum jyare apane mrtyu pami, mati ane hadakam bani ja'isum, te divase apanane badalo apavamam avase
kahese ke tame sum jova iccho cho
jotam ni sathe ja tene jahannamani vacce jose
kahese, allaha! Sakya hatum ke tum mane (pana) barabada kari deto
jo mara palanaharano upakara na hota, to hum pana jahannamamam hajara karavavala'o manthi hota
sum (a sacum che) ke ame mrtyu pamavana ja nathi
prathama mrtyu sivaya ane na apanane yatana apavamam avase
pachi to a bhavya saphalata che
avi (saphalata) mate karmo karanara'o'e karma karava jo'i'e
sum a mahemana navaji sari che athava jhakkuma (thora)num vrksa
jene ame atyacari'o mate sakhata kasoti mate banavyum che
Ni:Sanka te vrksa jahannamani jada manthi nikale che
jena guccha setanona matha jeva che
(jahannamana loko) a ja vrksa manthi bhojana karase ane tenathi ja peta bharase
pachi tena upara piva mate, ukalatum pani lavavamam avase
pachi te saunum pachum pharavanum, jahannama tarapha hase
ni:Sanka temane potana purvajone pathabhrasta joya
ane a loko temana ja marga upara dodata rahya
temana pahelana ghana loko pana pathabhrasta tha'i gaya hata
jemani pase ame saceta karanara mokalya hata
have tame jo'i lo ke je lokone dhamaki apavamam avi hati, temani dasa kevi tha'i
allahana nikatana banda'o sivaya
ane amane nuha a.Sa.E pokarya, to (jo'i lo) ame ketala srestha du'a kabula karanara che
ame temane ane temana gharavala'one te bhayanaka musibatathi bacavi didha
ane temana santanane ame baki rahenara banavi didha
ane ame temanum (sarum nama) pachalana lokomam jalavi rakhyum
nuha a.Sa. Para samagra srstina salama che
ame satkarya karavavala'one avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
te amara imanavala banda'o manthi hata
pachi ame bijane dubadi didha
ane te (nuha a.Sa.Num) anusarana karanara'o manthi (ja) ibrahima a.Sa. Pana hata
jyare potana palanahara pase pavitra hrdaya lavya
temane potana pita ane komana lokone kahyum, tame ka'i vastuni puja kari rahya cho
sum tame allaha sivaya ghadi kadhela pujyo iccho cho
to evum (janavo ke) tame samagrasrstina palanaharane sum samajo cho
have ibrahima a.Sa.E eka najara tara'o tarapha kari
ane kahyum ke hum bimara chum
ama te loko tenathi modhum pheravi jata rahya
(Ibrahima a.Sa.) Temana pujyo pase gaya ane kaheva lagya ke tame bhojana kema nathi leta
tamane sum tha'i gayum che ke vata pana nathi karata
pachi (sampurna takata sathe) jamana hatha vade temane marava lagya
te (murti pujako) dodata dodata temani pase avya
(ibrahima a.Sa.)E kahyum, tame temani puja kari rahya cho, jemane tame kotaro cho
jo ke tamarum ane tamari banaveli vastu'onum sarjana allaha'e ja karyum
te'o kaheva lagya, tena mate eka ghara banavo ane te (bhalake balati) agamam tene nankhi do
temane to temani (ibrahima) sathe yukti karavanum icchayum, parantu ame temane ja hina kari didha
ane temane kahyum, hum to hijarata kari potana palanahara tarapha javano chum, te jarura mane marga batavase
he mara palanahara! Mane sadacari santana apa
to ame temane eka dhairyavana santanani khusakhabari api

pachi jyare te (balaka) etali vaye pahoncyo ke temani sathe hare-phare, to temane kahyum, mara vhala dikara! Hum sapanamam tane jhabeha karata jo'i rahyo chum, have tum janava ke taro vicara sum che? Dikara'e javaba apyo ke, pitaji! Je adesa apavamam avyo che tene kari lo, "in sa'a allaha" tame mane dhiraja rakhanara pamaso
jyare banne mani gaya ane temane (pita'e) tene (dikarane) undha mathe padi didho
to ame avaja apyo ke he ibrahima
kharekhara tame potana sapanane sacum kari batavyum. Ni:Sanka ame satkaryo karanarane avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
kharekhara a khulli kasoti hati
ane ame eka moti kurabani tena phidayahamam (badalamam) api didhi
ane ame temanum sarum nama pachalana lokomam baki rakhyum
ibrahima a.Sa. Para salama che
Ame sadacari lokone avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
ni:Sanka te amara imanavala banda'o manthi hata
ane ame temane is'haka a.Sa,payagambarani khusakhabari api, je sadacari loko manthi hase
ane ame ibrahima ane is'haka para khuba krpa kari ane te bannena santana manthi ketalaka sadacari che ane ketalaka potana para khullo atyacara karavavala che
ni:Sanka ame musa ane haruna a.Sa. Para ghano ja upakara karyo
ane temane tatha temani komane khuba ja du:Khadayi yatanathi chutakaro apyo
ane temani madada kari, jethi te'o ja vijayi rahya
ane ame temane prakasita kitaba api
ane temane satya marga para rakhya
ane ame te banne mate pachala avanaramam a vata baki rakhi
ke musa ane haruna a.Sa. Para salama
ni:Sanka ame sadacari lokone avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
ni:Sanka te banne amara imanavala banda'o manthi hata
ni:Sanka ilyasa a.Sa. Pana payagambaro manthi hata
jyare temane potani komane kahyum, tame allahathi darata nathi
sum tame ba-a-la (eka murtinum nama)ne pokaro cho? Ane sauthi srestha sarjanaharane chodi do cho
allaha, je tamaro ane tamarathi pahelana lokono palanahara che
parantu komana loko'e temane juthalavya. Basa! Te'one jarura (yatanamam) hajara karavamam avase
allaha ta'alana nikhalasa banda'o sivaya
ame (ilyasa a.Sa.) Num sarum nama pachalana lokomam baki rakhyum
ilyasa para salama
ame satkarya karavavala'one avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
ni:Sanka te amara sadacari banda'o manthi hata
ni:Sanka luta a.Sa. Pana payagambaro manthi hata
Ame temane ane temana gharavala'o, darekane chutakaro apyo
te vrdva stri sivaya, je pachala rahenara lokomam baki rahi ga'i
pachi ame bijane nasta kari didha
ane tame savarana samaye temani vasti'o pasethi pasara thava cho
ane ratana samaye pana, sum to pana nathi samajata
ane ni:Sanka yunusa a.Sa. Payagambaro manthi hata
jyare bhagine bhareli hodi tarapha pahoncya
pachi ciththi nankhavamam avi, to te'o hari gaya
to pachi temane machali gali ga'i ane te'o potane ja dosita theravava lagya
basa! Jo te'o pavitratanum varnana na karata
to lokone uthadavana (kayamatana) divasa sudhi machalina petamam raheta
basa! Temane ame sapata medanamam nankhi didha ane te'o te samaye bimara hata
ane temana para chanyado karava mate eka velavalum vrksa ame ugadi didhum
ane ame temane eka lakha karatam pana vadhare loko tarapha mokalya
basa! Te'o imana lavya ane ame temane eka samayagala sudhi vaibhavi jivana apyum
temane pucho ke sum tamara palanaharane dikari'o che ane temana dikara che
athava a loko te samaye hajara hata, jyare ame pharista'onum sarjana strijatimam karyum
jani lo, ke a loko pote ghadi kadheli vato kahi rahya che
ke allahane santana che, kharekhara a loko juththa che
sum allaha ta'ala'e potana mate dikari'one dikara'o para prathamikata api
tamane sum tha'i gayum che? Kevi vato kaheta pharo cho
sum tame samajata pana nathi
athava tamari pase a vatano ko'i spasta puravo che
to java, saca hova to potani ja kitaba la'i avo
Ane te loko'e allaha ane jinnata vacce sambandha theravyo, jo ke jinnato pote jane che ke te'o (avi astha rakhanara loko)yatana same raju karavamam avase
je kami a loko varnana kari rahya che tenathi allaha ta'ala pavitra che
allahana nikhalasa banda'o sivaya
kharekhara tame sau ane tamara pujyo
ko'i ekane pana pathabhrasta kari nathi sakata
je jahannamamam rahevavalo che tena sivaya
(pharista'oni vata evi che ke) amara manthi darekani jagya nakki che
ane ame (allahani bandagi mate) la'inabandha ubha che
ane tena namanum smarana kari rahya che
inkara karanara kaheta hata
ke jo amari same pahelana lokonum varnana karavamam avatum
to ame pana allahana nikatana banda bani jatam
parantu a kura'anano inkara karava lagya, basa! Have najikamam ja jani lese
ane amarum vacana pahelathi ja potana payagambaro mate nakki tha'i gayum che
ke kharekhara te lokoni ja madada karavamam avase
ane amarum ja laskara vijaya melavase
have tame thodanka divasa sudhi temanathi modhum pheravi lo
ane temane jota raho ane te loko pana agala jo'i lese
sum a loko amara prakopani utavala kari rahya che
sambhalo! Jyare amaro prakopa temana medanamam avi jase, te samaye temani savara khuba ja kharaba hase, je lokone saceta karavamam avya hata
tame thodoka samaya sudhi temano vicara karavanum chodi do
ane jota raho ke te loko pana hamana ja jo'i lese
pavitra che tamaro palanahara, je ghani ja ijajatavalo che, te dareka vastuthi (jenum musarika loko) varnana kare che
payagambaro para salama che
Ane dareka prakarani prasansa allaha mate ja che je samagra srstino palanahara che
